did.unittitle: Clark S. Marlor Brooklyn tourism ephemera
did.abstract: One book of travel coupons and a handout titled "Tips on Tipping," issued by Le Beau Travel Service in Brooklyn, and six picture postcards of various Brooklyn scenes.
